dublin_core.dcvalue: Is it Working Approaches for Measuring Impact of mHealth InterventionsmHealth interventions are often declared to be working anecdotally yet where is the rigorous evidence of impact This session discusses three approaches that have been used to measure and report on the impact of mHealth projects and to ensure that these interventions are meeting or are on track to meeting their intended goals Speakers from Georgetown Dimagi and the University of Nevada will share their approaches and highlight some of the findings from their own mHealth interventions Presented by Dr William Nii Ayitey Menson Global Health Researcher Global Health Initiative University of Nevada Las Vegas
Reliability of Self- Reported Mobile Phone Ownership and Access in Rural North- Central Nigeria: A Cross- Sectional Study
